name: Rusty Padlock
description: An ancient padlock, its red paint chipping away to reveal the rusted metal beneath. Despite its age, it looks formidable.

name: Digital Keypad
description: A state-of-the-art digital keypad with a soft blue glow. Its smooth surface hints at advanced security features.

name: Vine-covered Lock
description: An old lock almost completely covered in vibrant green vines. Nature seems to be reclaiming this piece of metal.

name: Golden Combination Lock
description: A gleaming golden combination lock with intricate engravings. Its polished surface reflects light brilliantly.

name: Amethyst Crystal Lock
description: A lock made entirely of purple amethyst crystal. It seems to pulse with an otherworldly energy.
